required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison Between Two Total Knee Prosthesis Medacta GMK Sphere and Medacta GMK PS
clinical_study.official_title: Prospactive Randomized Monocentric Comparison Study Between Two Total Knee Prosthesis Medacta GMK Sphere and Medacta GMK PS

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to compare the clinical outcome after two total knee endoprosthesis designs Medacta GMK Sphere and Medacta GMK PS.
Primary outcome measures KOOS, Forgotten Knee Score and range of motion.
Single-center, randomized trial

detailed_description.textblock:
The clinical outcome measures were measured preoperativ and postoperativ (1 year, 5 year and 10 year).
Secondary outcome measures: number of reoperations and revisions, survival of the prosthesis
The patient population would consist patients with knee osteoarthritis eligible for total knee replacement
The aim of the study is to evaluate the effect of the knee prosthesis design on the patient outcome

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Knee injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score
primary_outcome.time_frame: preoperative, 1 year, 5 year and 10 year after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Knee injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score: 100 = maximum score, 0 = minimum score

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year, 5 year and 10 year after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Forgotten Joint Score: 100 = maximum score, 0 = minimum score

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year, 5 year and 10 year after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Revision rate comparision with the baseline at 1 year

secondary_outcome.time_frame: preoperative, 1 year, 5 year and 10 year after surgery

arm_group.description: Patients receiving total knee replacement surgery with the device "Medacta GMK Sphere"
Patients receiving total knee replacement surgery with the device "Medacta GMK PS"

intervention.description: Total knee endoprosthesis after knee joint osteoarthritis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patient is eligible for a total knee replacement
- patient is eligible for a Medacta GMK Sphere or Medacta GMK PS knee prosthesis
- patient signed the informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- patient is pregnant
